name: As a user I want to calculate how much money I can save in a registered retirement savings
description: plan so that reach my retirement goals

steps.name: User launches the application
User should be at the homepage
User accepts the privacy settings
User sees the Investments tab
User hovers over Investments tab
User clicks RRSP Calculator link
User should be at the rrsp calculator page
User should see the Calculator fields

elements.name: User should be able to click on rate of return tooltip to get a message explaining what to input

steps.name: User can see the tooltip next to the rate field
User clicks the tooltip for rate field
User can see tooltip content

arguments.val: "This is how much growth you expect to see in your account between now and retirement."

steps.name: User should see a message "This is how much growth you expect to see in your account between now and retirement."
User launches the application
User should be at the homepage
User accepts the privacy settings
User sees the Investments tab
User hovers over Investments tab
User clicks RRSP Calculator link
User should be at the rrsp calculator page
User should see the Calculator fields

elements.name: User should get an error when entering rate of return lower than 1% or higher than 1000%

steps.name: User inputs an invalid rate of return "-1"
User should be able to see the message "Please select a rate between 1% and 1000%"

User should be at the homepage
User accepts the privacy settings

User should be at the rrsp calculator page
User should see the Calculator fields

elements.name: User should get an error when entering rate of return lower than 1% or higher than 1000%

steps.name: User inputs an invalid rate of return "1001"
User should be able to see the message "Please select a rate between 1% and 1000%"
User launches the application

name: As a user I want to calculate how much money I can save in a registered retirement savings
description: plan so that reach my retirement goals

steps.name: User launches the application
User should be at the homepage
User accepts the privacy settings
User sees the Mortgages tab
User hovers over Mortgages tab
User clicks Rent vs Buy Calculator
User should be at the Rent vs Buy Calculator page
User should see the calculator fields

elements.name: User should be able to click on the amortization period and get a clear message of what it means

steps.name: User clicks the amortization period tooltip
User should be able to see "Most people choose a 25-year amortization period" in the period message
User launches the application
User should be at the homepage
User accepts the privacy settings
User sees the Mortgages tab
User hovers over Mortgages tab
User clicks Rent vs Buy Calculator
User should be at the Rent vs Buy Calculator page
User should see the calculator fields

elements.name: User should be able to click on the down payment tooltip and get a clear message of what it means

steps.name: User clicks the down payment tooltip

arguments.val: "In order to be approved for a mortgage, you will need at least 5% of the purchase price"

steps.name: User should be able to see "In order to be approved for a mortgage, you will need at least 5% of the purchase price" in the down payment
User launches the application
User should be at the homepage
User accepts the privacy settings
User sees the Mortgages tab
User hovers over Mortgages tab
User clicks Rent vs Buy Calculator
User should be at the Rent vs Buy Calculator page
User should see the calculator fields

elements.name: User should be able to see an error message if monthly rent is not provided

User accepts the privacy settings

name: As a user I want to locate the nearest ATM to an specific address so that I can plan ahead on a visit

steps.name: User launches the application
User should be at the homepage
User accepts the privacy settings

elements.name: Test that user gets instructions on how to use the search if no address is provided

steps.name: User clicks search address button
User should see a Where are you located? "Where are you located?" message
User should see a Share Your Location "Share Your Location" button
User launches the application
User should be at the homepage
User accepts the privacy settings

elements.name: Test that user gets the correct closest branches or atms given an specific address

steps.name: User inputs an address "130 Adelaide"
User clicks search address button
User should be able to see 10 closest ATM or branch suggestions
User should be able to see the cards
User should be able to see "Adelaide & York"
User launches the application
User should be at the homepage
User accepts the privacy settings

elements.name: Test that user gets the correct closest branches or atms given an specific address

steps.name: User inputs an address "222 Queen St"
User clicks search address button
User should be able to see 10 closest ATM or branch suggestions
User should be able to see the cards
User should be able to see "Petro-Canada"
User launches the application
User should be at the homepage
User accepts the privacy settings

elements.name: Test that user gets the correct closest branches or atms given an specific address

steps.name: User inputs an address "720 King St"
User clicks search address button
User should be able to see 10 closest ATM or branch suggestions
